GSD.description:
clk: mediatek: Fix memory leaks on probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit 02742d1d5c95cff8b6e9379aae4ab12674f7265d. For more details please see the references link.
